snippet: Taking part in a light, noncontact workout with U.S.A. Basketball, was a small but noteworthy step for Anthony, who has not played basketball since February, when he underwent surgery to repair a damaged tendon in his left knee.
abstract: New York Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony takes part in light, noncontact workout with USA Basketball; has not played basketball since February, when he underwent surgery to repair damaged tendon in his left knee.
lead_paragraph: Taking part in a light, noncontact workout with U.S.A. Basketball, was a small but noteworthy step for Anthony, who has not played basketball since February, when he underwent surgery to repair a damaged tendon in his left knee.

headline.main: Carmelo Anthony Takes Step in Test of Knee
headline.print_headline: Anthony Takes Step in Test of Knee
